meta_title: Forklift Licence Requirements Victoria: The 2026 Compliance Guide
meta_description: The definitive guide to forklift licence requirements in Victoria (Class LF/LO). Learn costs, RTO training, and how Factory AI automates fleet compliance.
title: Forklift Licence Requirements Victoria: A Comprehensive Guide to Compliance, Costs, and Fleet Safety

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Forklift Licence Requirements Victoria: A Comprehensive Guide to Compliance, Costs, and Fleet Safety

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, high-quality hero image inside a modern, clean warehouse in Victoria, Australia. The scene shows a diverse group of warehouse workers and a maintenance manager. In the foreground, a female worker wearing a hard hat, high-visibility vest, and safety glasses is conducting a pre-start check on a yellow forklift. She is holding a rugged tablet (back of device visible) appearing to use an app. In the background, a male manager is pointing at a digital dashboard on a wall-mounted screen showing green "health status" icons for the fleet. The lighting is bright and industrial. No text or logos should be visible on the clothing or machines. The atmosphere conveys safety, technology, and efficiency.
